author: CBC News
title: Canadian gas prices to spike as Ukraine conflict prompts oil market chaos | CBC News
description: Canadians can expect to pay more at the pump as Russia's attack on Ukraine puts even greater pressure on an already surging oil price environment.
content:
Canadians can expect to pay more at the pump as Russia's attack on Ukraine puts even greater pressure on an already surging oil price environment.
